segments.transcription: When the ([B 1]) sunlight strikes ([B 1]) raindrops in the air, ([MSR 1] they act as a-) ([B 1]) they act as a prism ([B 1]) and form a ([B 1]) rainbow. The rainbow is a division of

([B 1]) white light into many beautiful colors. These take the shape ([P 1] oo) of a long {w: 1} ([SR 0] r-) round arch ([B 1]) with its path high above and its two ends apparently beyond the horizon.
